name: For The Wild
description:
2D Sidescroller Shoot'em up the project form GGJ ANT X DPU 2023 

You will play as "Slyphy" a guardian of the forest to pretect it from Evil human.

This is demo version so your experience might be short but feel free to comment our game to make this game better in positive way.

Now available in English language 

How to play:

Move set- W=walk up A= walk left S= walk down D= walk right 
Mouse= left click Shoot
Q = Skill 1

E = Skill 2

If you like our game.pls follow us on Twitter Little Duck (@LittleDuckStudi) / Twitter
